item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Now that the weather is getting warm, I thought it would be nice to schedule a walk/hike through beautiful Nahant. The route I have in mind is 3 miles and passes by three beaches with one overlooking the Boston skyline. This will be more of a walk than a hike but there will be a couple of hills involved. It's a pretty good workout.

Weather permitting, we will meet at the far end of the beach next to the Dockside Restaurant. (We can go there afterwards if anyone is interested.) Directions will be forthcoming. Dogs are certainly welcome but they will have to be on leash.

Hope to see you there.

Kathy G

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Not too Intense Walk Through Nahant
